Plot: A mysterious creature "Kyubey" offers a young girl named Madoka Kaname the chance to have any one wish granted to her. In exchange she must battle evil creatures named "Witches" at the risk of losing her life.
Title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part 1: Beginnings
Writer: Gen Urobuchi (screenplay), Alexander Von David (english adaptation)
Director: Yukihiro Miyamoto, Akiyuki Shinbo, Alexander Von David
Actors: Aoi Yuki, Chiwa Saitô, Eri Kitamura, Kaori Mizuhashi
